resources.string: Welcome to the great dating predictor
Hang Tight! We are calculating your prediction now...

string-array.name: Questions1
string-array.item: Which power ranger speaks to you most spiritually?
What...is your quest?
Do you think cats have any regrets?
What’s the longest you’ve left dropped food on the floor for before picking it up and eating it?
How many murders have you witnessed?

string-array.name: Questions2
string-array.item: How quickly would you leave me for Chris Hemsworth?
How long are you willing to sit in agony rather than stand up and get an out-of-reach remote?
How many days do you wear the same pants in a row before it becomes, like, a problem?
Have you ever been, like, sexually attracted to a piece of fruit?
How many times a day do you wish you could just set yourself on fire?

string-array.name: Questions3
string-array.item: Which room in Hogwarts would you most wanna have sex in?
How big do you think Thor’s penis is, just like, scientifically speaking?
Can I trust you to never pressure me into faving one of your tweets? Ever. Like, not even if we get married?
Do you put the toilet paper roll on the right way or the murderer way?
Have you ever shit so hard you had to lie down after?

string-array.name: Questions4
string-array.item: How many donuts can you fit in your mouth at once?
Have you ever shit so hard you had to lie down after?
How many seconds into the first movie theatre preview do you finish your bucket of popcorn?
When is the last time you clogged a toilet and just left it for someone else to deal with?
Would you literally have sex with a minion?

string-array.name: Answers
string-array.item: We advise a couple beers to improve the outcome of this date..
You\'re definitely going to die alone.
They tell me they can\'t wait for your date.
On second thought, bring flowers too.
Listen it’s not my fault your father didn\'t love you. Get off my back!
Ask again later. I can\'t…I just can\'t deal with this right now.
You weren\'t born smart, but it looks like a change is in the air...good luck!
You should tell your date to FUCK OFF!
Stay home, drink heavily and touch yourself!
How do you feel about livestock for an alternative dating experience?
No one likes you!! I\'m sure you knew that...
Pack a bag full of ruffies and head out!
Invest money in flesh light stock...
You can leave the antibiotics at home.
You will live a long happy life together... so you think.
Save time, stop looking, you have found your match.
You rely on the magic 8-ball too much! Get a life!
You will never be lonely again!
Tonight will be the best tossed salad you ever had.
Use birth control!
You will get laid tonight if you play your cards right!
Don\'t expect love...or your date, to show up.
Don\'t fret my pet, all will be well...
It\'s not just your mom who likes you, so does your upcoming date.
Don\'t just give up...you\'re not hopeless or ugly!
Buy some eggs before your date...you\'ll be making breakfast in bed.
Just nod your head, smile and bring lube.
I see warts in your future!
Tomorrow, invest heavily in antibiotics.
Hope you\'ve been practicing cardio for your 17 seconds in heaven!
You will disappear, and no one will find the body.
Huuuuuuuuuummmmmmmmmm!!!!!!!
Smile and stop thinking of your ex. I predict good times ahead.
WTF!
WTF! (Wrestle Then Fuck)
I don\'t like you enough to give you a prediction...
I predict you will shake the 8-ball again...
Your date is a stalker...BONUS?
You will be in love for one night...
Put down the pipe...be alert...don\'t mess this up!
RUN!
I see a Viagra refill in the future.
Your date will beat you silly tonight...in a good way...score!!!!!
For a good time call ...someone who gives a fuck!
You have a better chance having sex with your pillow!
Don\'t commit suicide with a butter knife yet, hot night ahead!
You will turn into a dildo at midnight!
You will be married in Vegas by the end of the night.
Yes... you will fall in love tonight...but will they?!?
Giggity, Giggity!!!
